name: nativescript-contacts-picker
description: A NativeScript plugin to pick contacts

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios --watch
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-contacts-picker && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: npm i && cd demo && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
